---
title: "Google Bard Explained | Edureka"
excerpt: "This Edureka video on 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐁𝐚𝐫𝐝 will talk about the new experimental language model created by Google called “Bard”. Bard AI is designed on top of Google’s current AI language model, BERT, to understand natural language processing tasks like question answering, sentiment analysis, and language translation (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers). The  language Model for Dialogue Applications powers Google Bard (LaMDA). It has been introduced on the LaMDA lightweight model."
